item.description:
A wine tasting and social will be held at a member's house in Amherst on Saturday night, November 22nd at 7:00pm.

Please bring your favorite wine and a snack or finger food to share. This is a chance to meet new people in a comfy home environment. The holidays will soon be upon us and you can start celebrating by trying new wines with new friends.

(If you are not into wine, then bring a six pack of your favorite beer to share.)
This is a joint event with "Spice of life too short".
item.name: Wine Tasting Social
